MODAL_AUTHORIZATION_RECOVERY_DESCRIPTION: To recover your password, you must provide a login or email address associated with your account. An email will be sent to you with a recovery link.

MODAL_COMMENT_HIDE_DESCRIPTION: Are you sure you want to hide this comment?
MODAL_COMMENT_HIDEN_REASON_DELETED: The comment was deleted by the user.
